title: Just what you're looking for! 2 Bed / 1 Bath. IMT Pleasant Hill
posting_body: ['Come and see what the fuss is all about at IMT Pleasant Hill, located at 225 Coggins Drive Pleasant Hill, CA 94523.', 'Description', '........', '**Choose from 3 tour options.', '**', 'Welcome to IMT Pleasant Hill, the top selection in Pleasant Hill apartments.', 'Our lovely apartment community is in a perfect location along the edge of the mountains and a quick drive from the bay.', 'If you are looking for the best in apartment living look no further than IMT Pleasant Hill.', 'At IMT Pleasant Hill we offer a variety of floor plans including studio, one and two bedroom apartment homes.', 'Finding your way here could not be easier.', 'We are just off Interstate 680 on Coggins Drive.', 'When you arrive, you will be in a neighborhood sure to accommodate all your needs.', 'We are near several employers as well as the BART station.', 'If you are looking to unwind we are located near a wide variety of dining, entertainment and recreation options.', "We can't wait to help you begin the journey toward this fantastic apartment experience.", 'Take a Virtual Tour of Our Property Today!', '<URL>', 'B1 Floorplan (928SF)', 'show contact info', 'Bedrooms',
